website_summaries.verdict: A terrific Bluetooth speaker that can be submerged in up to 3 feet of water for up to 30 minutes.
pros: Provides superb volume levels in crisp high definition
Runs on Dual 5 watts of power to deliver boombox-quality sound
Can be connected to a Bluetooth-compatible smartphone or tablet in just seconds
Includes a hands-free microphone, enabling you to use the speaker to answer phone calls as needed
cons: May cause muffled and distorted sounds at times

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for water
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this speaker to use in the hot tub. It's amazing. My phone is safe inside and the speaker blue tooth works fine probably 40 feet away from it. It's loud enough to hear over the jets running. The only down fall I've found is you control the volume from your device not the speaker. So you can't change that from the water.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: when you put it in the water it gets static and the music starts to cut but when you take it out it's fine. The whole point is being in the water
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, when you put it in the water it gets static and the music starts to cut but when you take it out it's fine. The whole point is being in the water. Can't have the phone far away either if that's where you are playing your music from. Has to be close or loses connection. Only nice thing is it plays a long time without charge.
customer_reviews.author: mcdk

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our pool time!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome choice for pool time!!! I bought this speaker to replace a smaller version which got water damage (even though was supposed to be waterproofed. This one is larger and sounds a lot better. Bluetooth connection is pretty strong and stable but I keep my phone by the pool anyway so I can’t attest as to connection range. My kids have dunked it under water countless times and it still works like the day I took it out of the box. Extremely happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to set up and use speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my bathroom while showering. I don't have to worry about water splashing on it, nor the humidity to affect it. The speaker sounds real nice and is super easy to connect with my phone. I've been using it every day for a couple weeks now and haven't had to charge it after the initial charge. Granted it's only being used for a few minutes while my wife, my son and I take turns showering. This would be perfect at the pool or at the lake as well since it does float! If you're in the market for a waterproof speaker, this is the one you should get.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Morphis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect around/in water
customer_reviews.text: The speaker paired up effortlessly and was playing audio in no time. It floats on water (which it should do) fine. Yes you will notice a reduction on operating distance from your device since water being a liquid doesn't easily pass radio waves through it unlike in the air (it also reflects radio waves).
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Hardly waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Cool ideas but it is only slightly waterproof. It can handle a few drops but any waves in your pool and the sound is muffled almost to silence. Ended up buying a regular speaker to just leave on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Shuck

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 OUT THE DOOR
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SOUND INDOORS AND THE OUTDOOR IS OMG, THE SOUND IS SO EFING RICH IT'S TOTALLY WORTH, AND THE BETTER YET IT'S WATERPROOF. IF WATER GETS IN THE SPEAKER HOLES YOU JUST DUMP IT OUT, SHAKE IT WITH A TOWEL AND IT'S LIKE IT NEVER HAPPENED.
customer_reviews.author: Cheka18

customer_reviews.title: Fun, good sound, kid proof
customer_reviews.text: Have enjoyed this speaker and wish I would have purchased it last year. Kids throw it underwater, then just tip over to let water run out. Only down side is that when it floats over 15’ away from the Bluetooth source it drops signal.
customer_reviews.author: J Sully

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Performed as expected for the money. Great in the hot tub. Great value. Sound quality is so so but perfectly adequate and plenty loud. You can’t go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Liwoch

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our pool, the speaker performs well. Sound quality is excellent when dry. Occasionally water will get in and diminish sound, but this can be rectified by shaking the water out. No complaints here, speaker is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: JenniTiran!

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It cannot get too far away from the phone. If it goes to the other side of the pool, the sound gets distorted. Battery life is amazing. If it flips over, drain the water immediately and it will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joy McCook

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: I like it for the most part but it does not have a strong Bluetooth. Water gets in it stops playing. Shook the water out it took a little time to come back on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great. I use it to float in the lake ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. I use it to float in the lake so I wanted something cheap that sounds ok and this is it. In a pool turned very loud this may not be the rite choice. But floating in the lake with a drink it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great! Easy set up. Last a long time (I haven't actually timed it) but last through a birthday party. Sound is good.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M. Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and it's all waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great and this thing is water proof! Battery last longer than 8 hours. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimming
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the pool. If water gets in speakers just shake it out no problem. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Elysse G

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait for summer!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to use this in the pool; so far I've only been able to use it in my bathtub. Sounds great though!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gannaway

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Your phone has to be really close by or you’ll get static
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Leonard

customer_reviews.title: It really is water resistant!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker for the lake! We had it floating in the water a few times and it still worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Swimming hasn't been boring since we purchased
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I LOVE this. IF there were one thing to offer, I only wish there was a little bit more of a range for the Bluetooth, but still amazing and works just fine. Slightly harder for us for the simple fact that we have an above ground pool and no direct surrounding.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product perfect for taking anywhere including kayaking! A little bigger than expected...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 3 days of swimming had a pool party so people were splashing and moving around and know it crackles the entire time it’s on and sounds awful tried drying it out emptying water nothing works. Also have to constantly dump the water out for good volume.
customer_reviews.author: mert

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Have to be close to get reception,not good for floating in pool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short range on Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Blue tooth range is less than ideal, other than that sounds pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrus Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Work good and battey life is long. Loud enough too to hear over hot tub jets
customer_reviews.author: Keith johnson

customer_reviews.title: The range of the speaker.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker has a long battery life and it works great with the iphone or andriod phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S

customer_reviews.title: it seems to work fine out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive a recharge Micro USB DC5V/1A. No way to contact the seller...it seems to work fine out of the box..but what good is it if we can't recharge it?! I hate to return it...but I guess I have to. Was for a Christmas gift and when I opened the box I realized it didn't have the cable. Phooey.
customer_reviews.author: debi mastnjak

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool and jacuzzi, decent audio
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a present for my brother who spends time daily in his jacuzzi. Charging and set up was easy - it's been a hit! He loves that it floats and passes it back and forth between the pool and the jacuzzi. Audio quality is decent and I'm happy that we can all enjoy it as a family.
customer_reviews.author: Smartbuyer4

customer_reviews.title: it was ok for awhile
customer_reviews.text: at first it was cool , but have vert short battery life , less than one full year and now will not charge
customer_reviews.author: Jjoe

ECEEN Waterproof Floating Speaker, For Every Occasion
Enjoy your music on the go, everywhere you go. It is pleasant enough to help you relax. Perfect for home, dorm room, kitchen, bathroom, car, beach, and parties. Rugged, buoyant, and portable size makes a worry-free experience that floats in any water environment for river rafting, swimming pools, and indoor showers. High definition dual 5W audio drivers with passive subwoofer for high quality audio. 

Features: 
Water-resistant (IPX7) 
Supports (R) & A2DP
Wireless range: 120ft(36meters) 
Includes Micro USB to USB cable
Built-in rechargeable battery 5-hour battery life
